title: How Phishing Attacks Work
content: Phishing attacks trick users into revealing sensitive information by pretending to be trusted entities through email, SMS, or fake websites.

title: Strong Password Practices
content: Always use long passwords with a mix of letters, numbers, and symbols. Avoid reusing passwords across platforms.

title: How Ransomware Spreads
content: Ransomware often spreads through malicious attachments, fake software updates, and unsecured remote access.
